recordLookups.name: Get_Duplicate_Accounts_with_Same_Email
recordLookups.label: Get Duplicate Accounts with Same Email

fields.name: Instruction
fields.fieldText:
Account records with this email already exist. Please select the appropriate option to proceed.


  • Submit Merge Request Clicking this button will raise a request to merge duplicate records.
  • Request for Same Email Clicking this button will raise an exception request for the approve or reject. If approved, the Email will be updated on the account.

value.stringValue: Merge request already raised for this Account for same Email!!

textTemplates.name: EmailBodyCaseCreation
textTemplates.text:
Hello Team

A new case has been assigned to you.


Case Number: {!Create_Case_Record_for_Merge_Request1.newCase.CaseNumber}

Subject: {!Create_Case_Record_for_Merge_Request1.newCase.Subject}

Priority: {!Create_Case_Record_for_Merge_Request1.newCase.Priority}

Status: {!Create_Case_Record_for_Merge_Request1.newCase.Status}


Please review the case and take the necessary action.


Thank you,

Aldar Team
